Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a dirt road running along the edge of the dark, shadowy forest

A well-worn road cuts through the grassland, the eastern side blockaded by a densely treed forest. The supple new grasses of spring sway in undulating patterns, the sound accented by the rustle of new leaves from the nearby forest. The heavy cloak of darkness bathes the area in shadow, the air chill and damp with the spring thaw. Thick green stalks of grass sway slow and lazy in the heat of summer, the boughs of the nearby trees hanging heavy with thick foliage. The dark of night provides a cool respite from the heat, the ground still radiating warmth. The golden brown waves of grass rustle softly with every breeze, the colorful autumnal leaves dancing among the canopy of the nearby forest. The night is chilly, darkness bathing the area in dense shadow. Grasses matted down with frost lie heavy and dense on the ground, the canopy of the nearby forest free of leaves in the chill of winter. Darkness covers the surrounding area in thick shadow, the air icy cold in the deep of night.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ A mounted traveler gallops by, leaving a cloud of smoke in his wake. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a shrill squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| A group of travelers can be overheard whispering of troubles that lurk on the road at night. \| A \{ young \| old \| sickly \| poorly-dressed \| nicely-dressed\} \{ woman \| man \| merchant \| soldier \| mercenary \} \{ smiles \| nods \| grunts \} in passing. \| A cloaked traveler seems to look you over as you pass by before hurrying away. \}\ \\{ An eerie silence falls all around you. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a startled squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| The sound of footsteps seem to draw closer. \| A piercing cry pervades the night air. \| The road behind you seems to disappear in the darkness. \}\ \}

X[S] \{ \ \{ A mounted traveler gallops by, leaving a cloud of smoke in his wake. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a shrill squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| A group of travelers can be overheard whispering of troubles that lurk on the road at night. \| A \{ young \| old \| sickly \| poorly-dressed \| nicely-dressed\} \{ woman \| man \| merchant \| soldier \| mercenary \} \{ smiles \| nods \| grunts \} in passing. \| A cloaked traveler seems to look you over as you pass by before hurrying away. \}\ \\{ An eerie silence falls all around you. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a startled squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| The sound of footsteps seem to draw closer. \| A piercing cry pervades the night air. \| The road behind you seems to disappear in the darkness. \}\ \}
